about_the_game:
STORY

Join Durandall and the Stars Reach Instructors on an adventure to the most perilous, pointiest, and prickliest peek that's ever protruded into the cumulous, Borg Mountain! If suspicion is correct, there is a secret cave containing an important clue to finding the evil sorcerer, Vaultes. However, its location is surrounded by monsters, protected with magic and shrouded in mystery.

Will you and your friends be able to unravel the mountain's secrets and unlock the hidden treasure within?
Play the first Faulty Apprentice FREE title update, "Escape From Borg Mountain" to find out!

Download the FIRST Faulty Apprentice FREE DLC, "Escape From Borg Mountain"!

This DLC update takes place after the GOOD ENDING in the Base game/Main Story. You will also need a save data from Day 20.
This DLC contains full body nudity, erotic dialogue, and consensual sexual act.

MAIN FEATURES

Escape From Borg Mountain has new features we are excited to share!
  • New Illustrations!- If that isn't enough to get you hyped, there is a super sexy scene featuring all three instructors as well as 3 even sexier scenes, one for each of the instructors <3
  • Fully Voiced! - First and foremost is fully-voiced dialogue! Now you can hear full sentences by the talented voice actresses.
  • Challenge!- We also have some exciting new challenges for gameplay! So no more chopping logs!

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

Join the conversation here or Faulty Apprentice Server, and let the AGL studios team know what you think of the game. We read all of the player's feedback!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Light Ecchi, Nudity or Mature Contents. All characters depicted in this game are over the age of 18 and older.
